title: Did a Dr. Seuss WWII Political Cartoon Criticize America’s Isolationism?
subtitle: Theodor Seuss Geisel created a number of biting political cartoons during WWII, including one condemning American indifference to the deaths of foreign children.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: A 1940's Dr. Seuss political cartoon criticized Americans for not caring about the deaths of foreign children.
